short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces references to Donald Trump with more accurate descriptions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension cleanses some of your web pages of the words "Donald Trump" and replaces them with funnier, more apt descriptors.

It has lots of useful configurable features:

    * clean, dirty, or mixed insults
    * mock-o-matic auto-generated insults, including a Shakespearean "Bard" mode
    * optional conversion of Trump images to kittens, puppies, or bunnies
    * customizable / optional formatting of insults
    * set length restrictions on insults
    * set what fraction of Trumps get replaced
    * optional for lots of other common RWNJ's
    * optionally black-list websites you do not want Detrumpified or white-list websites you do want Detrumpified
    * ... and MUCH MUCH MORE!


Props and Credits:
  -- The initial list of replacement names goes to Jezebel.com, which compiled a list of 70 such names for DT's birthday:
http://theslot.jezebel.com/in-honor-of-donald-trumps-70th-birthday-here-are-70-wa-1781899319. They continue to expand their list: http://theslot.jezebel.com/every-description-jezebel-used-for-donald-trump-during-1772372244. I have gathered more names from around the web, and will add new ones as I find them.
  -- The image replacement idea came from  "Trump Kittens" Chrome extension (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/trump-kittens/ccghcnenefcpjjikaalmfkafenlhagpn)



*** NOTE *** If you are wondering why it doesn't work on a particular site: 

Detrumpify was designed not to interfere with you. By default it only runs on a whitelisted list of websites that are baked into the config file. If you want it to run on all websites, choose the "ignore whitelist" option. You can also generate your own blacklist of specific sites that the extension should *not* run in, by entering them into the blacklist.


Versions
1.3.0 - update to manifest v3
1.2.12 - allow users to hand-edit config again locally
1.2.11 - minor fixes for people using custom config files
1.2.10 - simplify the page running logic to allow user-editable whitelist or user-editable blacklist
1.2.8 - fix bug with hyphens in blacklist. Turn off debug messages in console
1.2.7 - new user configurable blacklist. Add type in hostnames for sites you don't want detrumpified, or click a button to add the current page to the list.
1.2.6 - click detrumpified images to see the original trumpy image
1.2.5 - new feature! "Bard Mode" under Mock-O-Matic. What would Shakespeare say?
1.2.4 - new feature! "Breaking News" Turn it on in the options!
1.2.3 - shows the original text on hover
1.2.2 - add FB page link
1.2.1 - bug with brand-new users
1.2.0 - puppy images, bunny images, config fetch by https, major cleanup and refactoring, remove option for editing config in the plugin (if you want to use a custom config, contact me for help!)
1.1.43 - bugfixes including frequency mode repaired
1.1.40 - new experimental "scan on change" mode which will capture asynchronous page updates 
1.1.39 - bug with saving "run_anywhere", fix to allow trump replacements to include "trump"
1.1.38 - allow user to set fraction of T mentions that get replaced
1.1.37 - basic mock-o-matic and bugfixes to options
1.1.36 - use defaults for enabled actions if user has not set preferece
1.1.35 - added steve bannon (optional as always)
1.1.33 - add link for submitting new insults
1.1.32 - more kittens mode has more aggressive T image detection
1.1.31 - add option to run on *any* site (ignore whitelist)
1.1.30 - make options more compact
1.1.29 - optionally replace images with divs
1.1.28 - separate regex for much improved trump images replacement
1.1.27 - bug
1.1.26 - kittens or blank or off
1.1.24 - kittens in pictures
1.1.23 - code cleanup
1.1.22 - bug
1.1.21 - moves most common configuration out of config file, into options ui
1.1.20 - allow users to enable only parts of config
1.1.19 - skipped, never uploaded
1.1.18 - add UI to allow user to set insult styles
1.1.17 - new icons
1.1.16 - config UI cleanup
1.1.15 - access options page from icon
1.1.14 - fix minor bug with too frequent insult update checking
1.1.13 - add Pence, fix minor formatting problem
1.1.12 - rename so so that people searching for Detrumpify get the current version
1.1.11 - revert default configs from dropbox back to toolsofourtools.org
1.1.10 - clean up config page
1.1.9 - changed name
1.1.8 - added "Drumpf-mode"
1.1.7 - move actual fetching of config to event page to avoid content security policy restrictions
1.1.6 - change config format and content code to allow multiple search/replace combinations in one file
1.1.5 - fix trump regex to avoid converting trump-based neologisms
      - rewrite replace section to allow formatting of new replacement chunk
      - add ability for arbitrary quoted
      - manifest changes to help stop XHR / CSP problems (still not resolved)
1.1.4 - had to move config files to https because new rules do not let chrome access http from https websites. I don't want to pay for SSL cert, so using dropbox.
1.1.3 - allow user to edit json in plugin and not use external resource
1.1.2 - configs, force no cache config, configs can very change freq
1.1.1 - bug fixes
1.1.0 - initial upload

This is an open-source project. Code can be found at https://github.com/djacobow/detrumpify
